languages.text: "Слава Боже-Императору, вы живы! Было так страшно… Как такие ужасы вообще могут существовать в Его мире?!"
"God-Emperor be blessed, you survived! It was so frightful… How could such abominations exist in His world?!"
languages.original_text: "Слава Боже-Императору, вы живы! Было так страшно… Как такие ужасы вообще могут существовать в Его мире?!"

traits.locale_text: "Blessed be the God-Emperor, you survived! It was so frightful… How could such abominations exist in His world?!"
"Blessed be the God-Emperor, you survived! It was so frightful… How could such abominations exist in His world?!"
"God-Emperor be blessed, you survived! It was so frightful… How could such abominations exist in His world?!"
"God-Emperor be blessed, you survived! It was so frightful… How could such abominations exist in His world?!"

languages.text: 「“神皇帝”に感謝しとけ。生き延びたな！えげつなかった……“神皇帝”の世界で、どうしてあんな化け物がいるんだ?!」
languages.original_text: "God-Emperor be blessed, you survived! It was so frightful… How could such abominations exist in His world?!"

traits.locale_text: 「“神皇帝”に感謝しとけ。生き延びたな！えげつなかった……“神皇帝”の世界で、どうしてあんな化け物がいるんだ?!」

languages.text: «¡Loado sea el Dios Emperador, sigue con vida! Ha sido espantoso... ¡¿Cómo es posible que existan semejantes abominaciones en Su mundo?!».
languages.original_text: "God-Emperor be blessed, you survived! It was so frightful… How could such abominations exist in His world?!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Loado sea el Dios Emperador, sigue con vida! Ha sido espantoso... ¡¿Cómo es posible que existan semejantes abominaciones en Su mundo?!».

languages.text: “神皇保佑，您还活着！这一切实在是太可怕了……祂怎么会允许祂的世界里存在这样的怪物？！”
languages.original_text: "God-Emperor be blessed, you survived! It was so frightful… How could such abominations exist in His world?!"

traits.locale_text: “神皇保佑，您还活着！这一切实在是太可怕了……祂怎么会允许祂的世界里存在这样的怪物？！”

languages.text: "Dem Gottimperator sei Dank. Ihr habt überlebt! Es war so fürchterlich ... Wie konnten solche Abscheulichkeiten in Seiner Welt existieren?"
languages.original_text: "God-Emperor be blessed, you survived! It was so frightful… How could such abominations exist in His world?!"

traits.locale_text: "Dem Gottimperator sei Dank. Ihr habt überlebt! Es war so fürchterlich ... Wie konnten solche Abscheulichkeiten in Seiner Welt existieren?"

languages.text: « Que l'Empereur-Dieu soit loué, vous avez survécu ! C'était terrifiant… Comment de telles abominations peuvent-elles bien exister dans Son monde ?! »
languages.original_text: "God-Emperor be blessed, you survived! It was so frightful… How could such abominations exist in His world?!"

traits.locale_text: « Que l'Empereur-Dieu soit loué, vous avez survécu ! C'était terrifiant… Comment de telles abominations peuvent-elles bien exister dans Son monde ?! »

languages.text: "Tanrı İmparator'a şükürler olsun ki sağsın! Çok korkunçtu... O'nun dünyasında böyle hilkat garibeleri nasıl var olabilir?"
languages.original_text: "God-Emperor be blessed, you survived! It was so frightful… How could such abominations exist in His world?!"

traits.locale_text: "Tanrı İmparator'a şükürler olsun ki sağsın! Çok korkunçtu... O'nun dünyasında böyle hilkat garibeleri nasıl var olabilir?"
